name: Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo + Conditioner Duo for Oil Control
about: What it is:A juice-and-smoothie-inspired shampoo and conditioner duo packed with vitamins and minerals to support healthy hair and scalp, plus a unique papaya enzyme known to help balance oil production..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Oiliness.Key Benefits:- Cleanses and conditions hair with vitamins and minerals.Highlighted Ingredients:- Papaya Enzymes: Naturally derived enzymes that are known to help balance oil production..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This sulfate-free and silicone-free shampoo and conditioner duo harnesses the power of papaya enzymes to help balance oil production on hair and scalp. The formula also contains antioxidant-rich fruits, vitamins, and nutrients to support healthy-looking hair. The shampoo is formulated with 93 percent naturally derived ingredients and the conditioner is formulated with 96 percent naturally derived ingredients..This Set Contains:- 12.5 oz/ 369 mL Superfoodsu2122 Mango + Cherry Oil Control & Balancing Shampoo

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo:                        .-Apply to wet hair and massage from root to tip, then rinse..-For best results, follow up with Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Conditioner...Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Conditioner:.-After shampooing, apply and massage into the hair, ensuring the conditioner is applied evenly. .-Leave in for up to two minutes before rinsing..-For best results, pair with Briogeo Superfoods Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo... reviews.review_text: I have tried so many shampoos for oily hair on the search for one that actually helps. Unfortunately, this one wasn't it. Also the fragrance was too much for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy, slightly frizzy Asian hair. My scalp gets oily and this set wasn't a good fit for me. I needed A LOT of shampoo to feel clean and the conditioner didn't give me that silky slip feeling. The packaging looks nice, but the conditioner needs to be in an upside down bottle, the conditioner is very thick. After washing, my hair didn't look or feel special in any way, I want to say it felt a little weighed down too. I have plenty of other products I would rather use, so I passed this set along to my husband. Honestly I would rather have thrown it away, but it was too expensive to just toss.

reviews.review_text: I don't love or hate this shampoo. The pros for me are that it smells really nice, and it makes my hair feel soft and clean. My cons, I don't find this to be very balancing. I have oily hair, and usually, by the next day, my hair is very oily again. I will finish using this product until it's gone. It probably won't be a repurchase type product for me.

reviews.review_title: Didnu2019t work for my hair and not worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this shampoo and conditioner for 3 weeks now and itu2019s an absolute waste of money! The shampoo is so diluted and doesnu2019t even emulsify - it doesnu2019t feel like my scalp gets cleaned and I always have to shampoo my hair 3 times! My hair gets tangled easily and I also notice more hair fall after using this shampoo. People have commented that they like the smell of the shampoo, it doesnu2019t smell bad, but I honestly donu2019t find it mind-blowing. In fact, it leaves my hair smelling stale the next day and I still feel greasy!   As for the conditioner, it doesnu2019t feel like thereu2019s any added benefit except itu2019s more costly for the price point if you get the bundle. Itu2019s almost impossible to squeeze the conditioner out due to the design of the bottle. Definitely a frustrating shower routine and I do not recommend getting this product!

reviews.review_title: Dried and thinned my hair out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this duo on super sale and was so excited because I LOVE other Briogeo lines but this was such a miss and very disappointing. My hair is normally VERY thick and dense and tends to be oily at the roots and dry from mids-ends. This duo was incredibly stripping and drying, made my scalp itch like crazy, and after using half the bottle I noticed some pretty major thinning/balding in patches of my hair. I used to have major issues with frizz and dry ends that were resolved but came back after using this. Luckily the thinning isnu2019t super noticeable because of how dense my natural healthy hair is but itu2019s still concerning. Iu2019m throwing the rest out and wonu2019t be repurchasing. Iu2019ve never had this issue with other products before so I thought I was crazy until I saw other negative reviews saying similar things.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this tonight for the first time, bought it last Wednesday, so a week ago. Wonderful shampoo and conditioner set, shampoo smells so good, lathers nicely and cleans the hair really well. Conditioner really good too, let it sit for a while to soak and then wash it out, leaves the hair really soft when washing it out. Great duo, happy I bought it. Usually I have the banana briogeo duo but for a while been wanting to try this set, so last week bought it, as it sounds delicious, and sure enough, works great. Leaves hair nice and clean, smelling good. Only downside is BRIOGEO you need to stop having those terrible seals on your shampoo's and conditioners, cause tonight, I obviously didn't think to check if there was a tab on top of both, until I used them, and theres a cover on top, you need to change that style of seal cause it is sooooo tough to get off, to the point, i got out of the shower, and used a tool to get it open which didn't work, only cut my finger.. cried, then got scissors to cut it. Please change the seal  thing. Otherwise, good duo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: a must for oily haired gals

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about a month and I have noticed a considerable decrease in the oiliness of my scalp! I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I LOVE other Briogeo products and wanted something for every day washing/conditioning. Sadly, this combo did not work out for me. The conditioner is VERY thick -- so if you're into that, great, but if you're not, you will hate this. It's so thick that it's difficult to get it out of the bottle, you'll need to store it upside down to use it. For me, this shampoo caused way worse dandruff, flakes, and oily scalp than what I already had. I also developed a rash on my neck which went away as soon as I stopped using this, so I must be allergic to something in it. I'm leaving two stars because it's not Briogeo's fault that I'm allergic to something (!!!), the packaging is adorable, the scent is fine, and maybe for others this will be fine. But for me, it was bad. I'll stick with my beloved other Briogeo products :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

Iu2019ve been using it for a few weeks now to give it a real shot, but I think Iu2019m done.  Definitely not for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great shampoo/conditioner for oily roots and dry(er) ends. No straw hair anymore, also I find my hair has more volume because it is more balanced and less oily at the roots after continued use. Plus it smells amazing! A little goes along way and it lathers beautifully. Will definitely purchase these products again.

I bought this recently during the recent sephora sale. The benefits are that overall, my hair feels clean and less oily. The cons are the strong,chemically, fake fruit-like smell. The smell disapates after my hair dries, but it is truly strong. The other major drawback is that the conditioner isn't hydrating enough. My hair feels quite dry on the ends.

reviews.review_title: Not for dry or colored hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My only problem with this is that I want to eat it. I know I canu2019t it just smells SO good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best shampoo ever! It leaves my hair clean without making it dry and it smells amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell, not too much, just perfect. I already see a difference with my hair.

reviews.review_title: donu2019t do it, if you have oily hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: not for oily hair, but amazing for normal hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a great daily or clarifying shampoo for any hair type and especially someone with an oily scalp. My scalp tends to get oily after a day but using this I can go an extra day or two without a wash. The conditioner isnu2019t super hydrating if youu2019re like me and have dryer ends from highlighting and heat styling- but it still does a good job in conditioning and keeping it tangle free. When I havenu2019t washed my hair in a few days I have to shampoo twice but thatu2019s what I usually do anyways with any shampoo. It leaves my scalp and hair feeing super clean and light but not dehydrated/stripped. Iu2019ve got about 1/4 of the bottle left and it should last me the rest of the month. I purchased this back in late August so this bottle will have lasted at least 3 months.   Iu2019d also give this an extra star for the scent. I am not someone who likes to wear fruity scents but this does smell amazing. It kind of reminds me of something from The Body Shop but this is a lot more softer, clean and elegant to me and not at all overbearing yet the scent is long lasting on the hair. I love how my hair smells and wish there were other Briogeo styling products such as a dry shampoo with this scent.   I look forward to trying other products from this brand!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I was hoping it would help my oil but I wish I didnu2019t buy it.

The conditioner is thick, almost feels like body butter but my hair was soft, and not weighed down. Might not do what it claims but itu2019s still pretty great and it lasted about 3.5 months so Iu2019ll call it a win

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smells amazing! nothing like mango or cherries, just a sweet summer smell. i really really like it.  but it does nothing for my hair. the shampoo makes my hair look like i never washed it, which is a problem for my oily scalp and the conditioner feels like a film and it doesnu2019t hydrate. i tried so hard to like this set but it just doesnu2019t work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love other Briogeo products so loving this came as no surprise. The scent is strong and long lasting but is definitely a natural cherry & mango scent- not super sweet like artificial scents would be. The conditioner is super thick though so be careful with using it near the scalp, a little goes a long way. other than that, this product has been great for my colored hair and leaves little to no residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Retuned this immediately. I have fine, oily hair, and this was a huge no for me. The scent washes out and makes your hair smell like just plain wet hair. The conditioner did not help detangle my hair at all, and it was a pain trying to brush my hair. I returned for Moroccan Oil and would recommend that any day over this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually got compliments on how my hair looked the day after I used it! It feels great too! But. The smell. Cherries are great to eat, but the scent is very over powering and I donu2019t think mangos and cherries smell good together. Wish is was more mango scented. I unfortunately have to return this as I had an allergic reaction to the mango and avocado in this. Still figuring out what specific fruits and veggies I react to with my Seasonal Allergy Syndrome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have finer hair but a lot of it, donu2019t even bother. I used the entire thing, every single day was a bad hair day and I only put it together that this shampoo and conditioner combo was the culprit when I switched to pureology! Itu2019s okay on smell and lather, but itu2019s very drying to the hairu2026 even with a lot of leave in conditioner I was frizzy and my ends were crunchy!

I really wanted to love this product, but I do not for a few reasons; 1) I cannot deal with the smell. If youu2019re a fan of VS mango scent, then this may be appealing to you. 2) my hair ends up a tangled mess after every wash. I have to brush my hair in the shower with the conditioner on to avoid this. 3) I notice my roots are oily when I blow dry my hair.

reviews.review_title: plz buy this if you skip days between washes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was VERY skeptical about this product, mostly because my hair itself isnu2019t all that oily, but because i go 2-3 days between washes i want my hair to feel fresh for as long as i can. after trying tons of different high and low end shampoos and conditioners, i finally decided to give this a go with my expectations set pretty low. this stuff smells SO GOOD and it makes my hair insanely shiny and soft. this can be kinda weird for anyone with very thick hair like me, so it might be hard for you to use a claw clip on day one. bottom line if youu2019re looking to extend your wash days and keep your hair healthy and shiny this is the one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy the scent and texture of the product; however, it has given me scalp irritation and/or acne. My hair is oily and I style it after every wash which I do every 2-3 days. I do not see a difference in oil control as my hair is oily the next day. I will finish the product, and wait if I see a difference in 3 months, but I do not think I will repurchase this.

Love that this is formulated much cleaner than what I had been using, but the shampoo is sooooo liquidy & runny I had flashbacks to highschool when I had to use Suave. The conditioner is nice & thick and is what I expect from an expensive professional brand.
Hands down the BEST shampoo I have used for my dry bleached hair. It smells amazing too. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my hair so soft and it donu2019t dry it out and it smells so good . Itu2019s truly the best all of them are .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this duo. I alternate between using this set and the Drunk Elephant Shampoo and Conditioner and my normally oily thin but dense hair has never looked better.   Any time my hair is feeling extra oily I'll use this set - so far 1-2 times a week. My hair is so oily I can't skip a day washing my hair and this set makes it feel so silky and light. Love the scent too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This set has made my hair so smooth and silky itu2019s not even funny! First of all the smell? Can we take minute to acknowledge that while youu2019re in the shower it makes you think youu2019re in a tropical paradise drinking mango smoothies. If youu2019re looking for your next shampoo/conditioner, give this a try! I really hope they come out with a hair mask in this set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great and had good results with my curly hair. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hate the scent. Also probably not the formula for me. The shampoo seems pretty drying, but the conditioner is ok. The scent is like something from my gramas bathroom.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t usually write reviews for bad products, but this duo was way over hyped. I was so excited to try it & the shampoo smells like dish soap to me lol. The conditioner didnu2019t work any wonders either, my hair felt more dry. Super disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i donu2019t normally have issues with my hair getting oily after one day but when i use this shampoo and conditioner it becomes greasy as soon as itu2019s dry. wanted to try something different but back to olaplex i go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t normally write reviews, but god do I love this duo!!! I have been trying shampoos+ conditioners left and right to find the right one for my hair and THIS IS IT! Half way through the bottle and will 100% be repurchasing. Iu2019m hooked. I love the way it smells!! The shampoo leaves my scalp feeling super clean, yet doesnu2019t strip my ends nor leaves them feeling dry. The conditioner has enough slip to Detangle and leaves my hair soft. In short I love them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is for me, love the scent and the result , Restockkkk pleaaaaase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed by this set. I really liked the smell of the shampoo and conditioner, the shampoo lathered ok, and the conditioner coated my hair ok, but it was kinda hard to get the conditioner out of the container. I have alot of fine hair and I deal with oily scalp and I found that by nighttime, my roots were so greasy it looked like I hadn't showered in 3 days (due to my oily roots, I shower almost every day or use dry shampoo) and my ends didn't feel soft or healthy. I gave this a month of use to see if my hair would adjust and it just did not work. I returned both the shampoo and conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good, but it does not control the oil on my hair. My hair looks greasy! I am not going to repurchase this brand anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried to give this set a second, third, and several chances. No matter how much shampoo I use, how well I try to rinse it out, how little conditioner I use on just the ends, it leaves my hair feeling filmy or greasy. Itu2019s so terrible! Iu2019ve never had an issue like this with another Brigeo line or any other brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because I was in a desperate need for new hair products. Read that this was good for people with oily scalp so I decided to give it a try. Been using it for a month but Iu2019m not impressed at all. Packaging is cute, smells fruity but thatu2019s about it. Leaves my hair feeling greasy like I havenu2019t washed it in weeks. Honestly for the price, Iu2019ll just stick with the Olaplex ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this stuff as a gift and was super excited to try it at first. It smells great, the packing is super cute, the reviews looked promising. But after continuous use, about two months, now; my hair became super greasy! It seriously looks like I havenu2019t washed my hair in three days AND Iu2019ve been sweating for those three days if I donu2019t wash my hair the next day and thatu2019s without the conditioner! The conditioner is incredibly heavy and feels like a lotion for very dry skin.

reviews.review_title: YES GET IT IF YOU HAVE FINE OILY HAIR
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OH MY GOD. best shampoo iu2019ve ever tried in my life. i have a lot of hair but it is fine and i have always struggled with having to wash my hair every day but this helped! itu2019s also the only shampoo iu2019ve tried thatu2019s sulfate free and all of that, that still lathers a lot! all other sulfate free shampoos iu2019ve tried just kind of sit on my hair and i feel like iu2019m not washing it good enough. the conditioner is also great. i didnu2019t have to use much and i have a lot of hair. my hair smells so good and itu2019s so soft!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Confused by all these positive reviews. My hair is the oilier than ever the next day. It smells great and the packaging is cute but I would go for the Living Proof PHD shampoo over this.

reviews.review_title: how do I get my money back?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because it was marketed for oily hairu2026 and Iu2019m left with an even worse problem than before I started. My hair is so oily AFTER a shower that Iu2019m debating washing my hair again. I told my hair stylist about this product and she said thatu2019s a definite no no. Idk how there are positive reviews for this because it just does not do it for me whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did absolutely nothing got my hair. I typically wash my hair every other day but with this product I felt like I needed to wash my hair the next day again. It does not take away oily hair issue and made me have really bad flaky scalp if thatu2019s possible for oily hair. Smh!  Going back to my OG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My hair looks radiant, healthy and not oily at all. The shampoo is very light and very easy to use. The conditioner is more thick and has a very gentle fruity smell - not too strong like other conditioners. My hair looks beautiful and I will buy this again soon!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was previously using the Banana version of this set (which i looooove) but figured I would try out this one due to my thin, oily hair. Unfortunately this made my hair super greasy pretty fast and weighed it down as well. I wanted to like it so bad because it smelled so good! The shampoo cap also never stayed closed, so when I transported it it leaked all over my stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo and conditioner was absolutely awful. I gave it two stars because it has a pleasant scent that I didn't find overwhelming, and it lathers well.  The positives stop there. It made my oily hair so much worse. Even when only using it every two days (as recommended by Briogeo - I work out a lot and don't like to go very long between washes), my hair was disgustingly greasy as soon as 8 hours after I washed it, and I took time to ensure it was rinsed out really well. The conditioner is so chunky that it's difficult to get out of the bottle, it also turned the bottom of my shower into an oil slick. I will be returning this and absolutely will not repurchase it at any cost. I even washed my hair with clarifying shampoo to try to deal with the excess oil and residue created, and it barely helped. It's really frustrating that this shampoo is recommended for oily scalps, but in fact makes the problem even worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This set was the first Briogeo shampoo/conditioner product I've ever tried; the other lines never appealed to me, but when I saw this released, I knew I wanted to try it.  First, about the cleaning smell - yes, if you smell it straight from the bottle, it has a cleaning product smell, but once you use it in the shower, it smells like the true scent of mango and cherry. I personally smell more mango than cherry, but I still like it. That said, if you don't like fruity smells, you may not like this, as it does linger in your hair after a shower for a while. It's not sickeningly sweet, but it might not be for everyone.  Performance wise, my hair isn't crazy oily, but would start to visibly get dirty by the second day with other shampoos I have used. With this one, I'm able to stretch to the third day and can take it a fourth day with dry shampoo.  The conditioner is great too and leaves my hair feeling silky. I followed the instructions the first time I used this and applied it to my roots as well, and it didn't weigh my hair down or make it feel oily at all. Just left my hair feeling soft and healthy from root to tip.  Overall,  I like this and recommend it. I enjoy trying new hair products every so often, so I'm not going to declare it as holy grail status right now, but I'll definitely keep it in my rotation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly the worst oil control set Iu2019ve ever used. Usually I am die hard briogeo fan but this stuff made my hair more oily somehow. It did the opposite of what it was intended to do. It also left a weird film on my hair. I am not sure what went wrong with this but it made my hair oily by the next day. Gave my hair a good 2 months to acclimate to it and itu2019s a no from me. Wish I could return it.

reviews.review_title: itu2019s great. feels clean and refreshing.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this in a whim, I usually use the Aveda Cherry Almond but decided to try something more clean and true color friendly. Was recommended to try the Moroccan Oil line when I was in store but for me I canu2019t get past the smell of that line, so they recommended Briogeo and I love this stuff. The smell is like a fruity Vacay cocktail or smoothie but itu2019s not overpowering to me. As far as how it works, Like other true u201ccleanu201d shampoos it does not lather into a foam and a small amount goes along way and you need to work it in and rinse really good otherwise it will feel heavy and you waste product. Overall, It made my hair feel clean, refreshed and super soft and I have long thick fine hair, thatu2019s dyed red, that I flat iron with heat protection every day, and that I only wash every 3 days. Iu2019m glad I picked this up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thatu2019s is the best shampoo and conditioner I ever try from Briogeo I use for my kids also u263aufe0f is good for dry hair

reviews.review_title: next day hair was a greasy mess.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: really quite disappointed, supposed to be for oil control but by the next morning my hair was a greasy mess. smells very nice but the opposite of what itu2019s suppose to do. save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have an oily scalp and dryer ends. I typically wash my hair every 3-4, and use dry shampoo with my other shampoo. Does this control my oil? No, I used it and my hair was oily at the end of the day and apply a bit of dry shampoo in the evening have touch up in the morning. The scent is okay and they watery texture of the shampoo as a little has enough lather. I donu2019t think I will purchase this again since itu2019s expensive and does not follow claims of oil controlling my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never really found a shampoo and conditioner that made a difference with my hair until now. Iu2019ve always had oily hair and had to wash my hair everyday or every other, I just hated the feeling of oily hair. This is really the only product Sephora recommended for oily hair concerns and Iu2019m not disappointed. Iu2019ve been going 4 days without washing my hair which I have NEVER been able to do. It also leaves my hair smelling great on the second day, which Iu2019ve never had the scent from shampoo and conditioner actually last on my hair. It also makes my hair feel so silky and soft. I hope they never get rid of this because Iu2019m obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm OBSESSED. This set smells so delightful (perfectly fruity and a bit candy-like) and makes my hair feel so nice. My hair ends up light, fluffy, and soft, which is a dream come true. It definitely helps with oil control, but without making my oil production go into overdrive like other oil control shampoos have. The price might give you sticker shock, but this set is so worth it. I keep talking it up to everyone I know.

reviews.review_title: Best shampoo/conditioner I have found yet!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is my absolute new favourite! My hair is quite long and gets oily super fast but I can go days without washing it when I use this shampoo! The conditioner doesnu2019t weigh my hair down at all and makes it super soft and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made my hair dry and tangled/hard to brush. The shampoo was so watery it would slip from my hands sometimes and get wasted down the drain. Iu2019m going to try the banana one for dry hair but I really needed something for my oily scalp. The smell was nice, strong, but nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t listen to the those positive reviews. 99% of them are from people who received the product as a gift in exchange for a review.  This duo claims to be for oil control. What they really mean is that youu2019ll be oily and greasy after just one day. I have fine straight hair that can get greasy pretty quickly. After a long time, Iu2019ve managed to train my hair to go 3 days with no wash. I only tried out this product because they discontinued the original stuff I was using so Iu2019m on the hunt for a new shampoo/conditioner. I tried this out for 2 months. After washing my hair and letting it dry, I could feel how heavy this product is. Itu2019s never a good sign when you can feel product literally weighing down your hair. Made my already flat fine hair even flatter and by the next morning full head of grease. Kept on using it though because I thought maybe it was only like this since I just started using it. But it was exactly the same the entire time. Never got better, never u201coil controlled,u201d just nothing but flat greasy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been amazing. The smell is great, the way it leaves my hair feeling clean and fresh. It is worth the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing and leaves my hair very soft but my scalp is oily the next day already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using Don't Despair, Repair for the looongest time, but something went wrong and my hair started feeling really weird, so I switched to a different brand altogether. My go-to shampoo/conditioner was out of stock, so I went back to Briogeo to see if I could find something new to try. Enter this balancing duo - I have an oily scalp and wash 2-3x / week. Usually on the day after wash day, I need dry shampoo. Howeverrrr with this set, I don't! I haven't used nearly as much dry shampoo between washes since starting this regimen. I think what I'll do is stick with it for the summer, and then go back to my usual for cooler months when I have less oil production.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo scent reminds me of pine sol floor cleaner.  It is awful!  The conditioner, however, has an amazing smell.  If only the shampoo had the same smell.  *sigh*  It also caused me to break out on my scalp!  ugh......  My daughter also had the same issue with her scalp.  It is very unfortunate that I had to return it because of its smell and the scalp acne because I did like the overall feel of my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It just didnu2019t do it for me, Iu2019ve tried samples of Briogeo before and I liked it , but this one made my hair tangled and frizzy. The Oaui medium shampoo and conditioner is my holy grail and I will never switch!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Briogeo and their superfoods line so I had to try this new set! I love it! By far my favorite smell of any of their sets. Itu2019s not as moisturizing as the banana & coconut (the set I use most regularly), but definitely cleansing. I also donu2019t have to wash my hair as much when I use this set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly did not think it would work for me but, it does maintain the oiliness at bay. I use the conditioner on the ends only and I have noticed more manageable softness in the hair. I have think semi-straight hair and hitting it with a serum after makes a difference. My boyfriend loves the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this duo to be mediocre at best for Briogeo. It works ok, made my hair soft and all but no different really than others products from this brand. The smell however is terrible so I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am really in love with this hair care set and it works very well on my curly hair. The mango and cherry scent is absolutely amazing. Itu2019s not too sweet and reminds me off lip smackers as a child! The shampoo is not drying and the conditioner is very hydrating. I highly recommend this set for any type of hair.  I received this complimentary from Briogeo Hair Care but my opinion is my own:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best shampoo and conditioner Iu2019ve ever used! I have fine, oily, low porosity hair and I can go longer between washes now and my hair looks clean and healthy.  Only complaint is that it caused a fruit fly infestation in my bathroom. Make sure the lid is securely closed at all times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a fresh fruit smoothie and left my hair hydrated and silky without being oily or heavyu2014 will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this duo set not knowing if it would work on my hair and I was pleasantly surprised! Itu2019s been really good on my hair and has even improved the ends of my hair too. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the smell of this is just addicting!!! After using it my fine dry hair felt full and smooth... I hope they never stop making this!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product- I had been using the drunk elephant shampoo and conditioner for a few months but decided to switch it up and try something new. For reference I have wavy hair which is medium-thick. The shampoo cleanses my hair, leaving it clean but not stripped. The conditioner makes my hair feel soft and look shiny. The smell is also fantastic. Iu2019m not usually one for fruity-smelling products but these are an exception. Perfect for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this set after having some misses with previous Briogeo superfood sets because I heard from others that it didnu2019t leave the greasy residue that I experienced with the others.   I have dry mid lengths and ends, and a oily scalp (however it can be dry if I use something too stripping). My hair is fine in texture and I found this set was the perfect balance of cleaning my hair and moisturizing it enough so that it wasnu2019t super frizzy and dry. My scalp feels nice and clean, but not itchy and irritated like if it was too strong of a clean. I did follow the conditioner with some of the superfoods mask on just my ends for a few minutes, and I found that to be super hydrating and a nice addition to this set. Overall, my hair looks shinier and smoother now that itu2019s dried. I think if you have combo hair like me (oily scalp, dry ends) I would try this out! If you have super dry ends just add in a little bit of the mask after you condition and itu2019s perfect. I will probably alternate this set with a hydrating set every other wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not a fan. The scent does not smell like either mangos or cherries. It just smells super soapy, which isnu2019t bad but not what I expected either. I also have extremely thick hair and never experienced any type of weigh down from products, this left my hair feeling so gross. Iu2019ve heard good things about briogeo and Iu2019ve loved other products from them but this is a miss for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily hair in which if I shampoo it will only last about three days top but when I used this the second time And didnu2019t wash my hair for five days , my hair was just tad bit oily. Iu2019m surprised this product let me hold out my oily hair that long. Best investment ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never spent this much on shampoo or conditioner, but boy was it worth it. After a few days of use I have noticed how clean and shiny my hair is when I catch a glimpse in the mirror. Not stripped clean, but healthy and soft and shiny. I am a greasy girl who washes her hair daily (terrible, I know) and I think this will help me last longer between washes if I feel brave. The smell isn't my fave, but it isn't strong at all. I am so in love and will absolutely purchase again. A little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing, lathers super well, and the conditioner is super creamy and luscious.  It didnu2019t strip my hair of itself natural oils, which Iu2019m always afraid of when trying new hair products. Some people said they smelled a chemical or cleaner type of smell..!? I did not. It has a very mild but pleasant fruit scent.  I have color treated hair and my color has stayed beautiful since beginning use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little scared to buy this because of the price point and the size of the bottles but Iu2019m SO HAPPY I did. My hair was so soft and manageable after using these products. Iu2019ve been needing a new shampoo for a long time, especially after excessive color treatments, and this works so well. Definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this combo! The shampoo lathers up like a dream and leaves your hair with that u201cjust washedu201d feeling for 2 days. The conditioner is also a lovely addition and leaves your hair feeling silky smooth and well nourished. I will definitely repurchase this. The smell is very sweet and mango-y, which is really lovely! I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and doesnu2019t strip my hairu2019s natural oils

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Iu2019d use the shampoo again but try a more moisturizing conditioner.   I liked the scent. Itu2019s strong in the bottle and while using but not nearly as strong once your hair dries. reviews.review_text: Smells like a hookah lounge. Disgusting scent and terrible product. I had to wash my hair again after using. My hair actually starting falling out more after using a few washes and it made the ends dead and the tops oily. This is the first time I run out of shampoo before conditioner because the shampoo doesnu2019t lather. I donu2019t get the positive reviews for this and Iu2019m a fan of the scalp repair products, too. This just was a waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received for free from Briogeo. I was so excited to try this product since I had heard great things about Briogeo products. Unfortunately, for me and my hair, this was a super duper huge miss. The scent is VERY strong - it smells quite cloyingly sweet and kind of like if I had eaten a handful of mango and cherry taffies together. This is also very expensive. $49 for shampoo and conditioner of this small size is quite high.  Smell and price aside. This absolutely killed my hair. I tried it for a week, but I had to stop because my hair started falling out and my hair was getting to be very strawlike while washing it. Maybe it overstripped my hair's oils? Maybe my hair isn't oily enough for this shampoo? I don't know. All I know is my hair became very stiff and brittle feeling, which is opposite of my very soft hair. So, that scared me (especially with the hair loss). On top of these issues, my scalp also became extremely itchy. I think it's maybe because of all the extracts and things in here, but all I know is that I've never been a scalp itcher, but it was so uncomfortable that I felt myself scratching my scalp in public...a lot.  Again, maybe my hair isn't oily enough for this product. I would not repurchase this product, even at a discounted price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Briogio kindly gifted me they are super foods mango and cherry balancing shampoo and conditioner in exchange for my honest review. The shampoo and conditioner come in clear packaging that looks like a bottle of juice, in my opinion. The shampoo is a bright orange color and smells very delicious.   I have straight, fine to medium hair and wash my hair 1-2 times a week depending on how active I am and my scalp doesnu2019t get very oily but also isnu2019t dry. I have recently highlighted hair so my hair has gone from healthy as can be to partially bleached and now requires a little more tlc.   When I apply this on my hair it actually made my hair tangled up so I wasnu2019t veryHappy about that but I lathered through and rinsed it off. I followed it up with a briogio super foods balancing Conditioner the conditioner is a very thick consistency and milky orange in color. I applied the conditioner starting from my end and worked my way up and oh Em Gee this melted right into my hair and began detangling my strands. I lathered the conditioner through my ends and my hair felt immediately softer and I was able to run my fingers through it while wet.   I was able to wash my hair on my usual schedule and the products did not weigh my hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Olaplex since the beginning of the year, it treated my hair very well and lasted me 4 WHOLE MONTHS. I got bored of it and it stopped working too well on me so I switched to this one.  It smells kind of like orange Starburst (in a good way) and leaves my hair silky and shiny and it stayed de-tangled for multiple days!  My only complaint, and maybe because I just got use to Olaplex for so long, the shampoo is very watery; I have to use a lot more than I use to to get a nice lather so it probably wonu2019t last me as long as Olaplex did. Not sure if the shampoo is worth the money, but the conditioner definitely is.  (For reference my hair is hip-length, medium thickness, and very straight. I tend to have oily scalp and dry end issues)

reviews.review_text: I honestly love Briogeo hair care products and these are no exception! Overall this brand is great because they are vegan and cruelty free, as well as being a clean brand without SLS, parabens, ect.  This is always something I look out for.  When it comes to the actual product, the mango and cherry has such a nice aroma in the shower and just smells so appealing.  I also like how the mango and cherry aren't just for scent but have purpose to helping my hair, providing vitamins and minerals to nourish and protect against damage. The antioxidants also helps with my hair, I have noticed my hair doesn't look and feel as greasy and I can go longer in-between washes with my hair still looking and feeling clean. I have naturally wavy/curly hair and it has not negatively effect my curls, they looked hydrated. My hair feels softer and I'm overall happy with the end results of my hair. I received this product complimentary from Briogeo Hair Care in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: many pros, but one MAJOR con
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I soooo wanted to love these, you have no idea. There are so many pros I can talk about! 1. It's full of healthy, clean ingredients 2. It's so aesthetically pleasing 3. It smells amazing 4. It lathers so easily and a little goes a long way which makes the price point worth it 5. It does control oil HOWEVER (this brings me to my major issue) it absolutely STRIPPED my hair. It left it so unbelievably dry and tangled I could not even get my comb through it, I had to get back in the shower and use a different conditioner to get a comb back through my hair. I have never had this kind of problem with another product before so I'm incredibly disappointed because like I said I was so pumped for this product.

This shampoo and conditioner set is a game changer for anyone in the market for a gluten free and vegan choice. I have hair that is in need of natural remedies without all the chemicals. gifted by briogeo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I donu2019t really smell any cherry or mango, just generic fruity scent, which does smell good. The instructions advise to vigorously massage for 30 seconds to build lather but with the usual amount of shampoo I use it barely created any lather, so I had to go back and add more twice to get a low-medium lather. At this rate I think I will go through it quickly. The conditioner was thick, left it on for a few minutes and it didnu2019t do anything for detangling. Honestly donu2019t think it did anything. My hair is clean, but not noticing anything special. Based on my experience I think this set is overpriced and not doing anything to balance oil production. I still wash my hair every 2-3 days and use dry shampoo in between.

First of all, great smell! It even feels like a real smoothie. I love the presentation, Iu2019ve been using it for more than a week now. This set was gifted by Briogeo Hair Care to me and I do feel a difference on how shiny my hair looks. I love how my hair smells after.

reviews.review_text: Things which I love -  Shampoo - Smells just like delicious Smoothies. The texture is running gel-like. Lathers nicely. Deeply cleans the Scalp & the Hair. Remove the Oils. I find this Set quite gentle on the Hair, it doesn't feel heavy on my hair which I love, also smells Amazing. I love Mangoes and absolutely love the smell. It nicely cleans my Oily Scalp but keeps my dry Hair hydrated, which is great.   Overall it's a lovely set that makes Hair Healthy. Also, it's free from Harsh Sulfates, Silicones, Parabens, etc. Plus they have Goodness of Fruits, Vegan & Cruelty-free! I have to continue using this to see the long-term results, so far I am enjoying this set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Briogeo Cherry & Mango Superfoods Shampoo and Conditioner   I was #gifted by briogeo hair  care  the Cherry and Mango Superfoods Shampoo and Conditioner set thanks to @briogeo . All I can say is WOW!! This set is everything I've been searching for to give my hair exactly what its been needing. As soon as i popped open the tops of these bottles, i was instantly in heaven with the delicious smell. The scent reminds me of being in a tropical paradise, with the smell of fresh fruits surrounding me. My hair seriously smells incredible and the scent actually lasts for days. reviews.review_title: A Hair Smoothie that Replenishes your Hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Briogeo Hair Care this Mango + Cherry Balancing Shampoo + Conditioner set in exchange for my honest review. I swear itu2019s like I dunked my hair in two different smoothies, but I absolutely loved it. I find the sweet and tropical scent quite strong in the shampoo, and is a bit more muted in the conditioner- but I still enjoyed the scent since Iu2019m into sweet scents! I really liked how the shampoo and conditioner were mostly naturally derived and that there were no harsh ingredients that seemed to damage my hair. I also appreciate that Briogeo creates products that are vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free. I struggle a lot with oil production in my scalp, which usually leads to an itchy scalp, but after using this shampoo and conditioner with papaya enzymes I can tell that coming out of the shower that my roots were no longer oily, yet my scalp did not seem dry nor dull. I truly did find that my hair was nourished and replenished after use, since my hair never felt as bouncy and shiny as it did after I air-dried it after my shower using these products. The products definitely helped a lot with the strength, health, and appearance of my hair; however, I find it cute yet a bit dangerous that the packaging of these products really did look like a smoothie or juice that I wanted to drink. I believe it was a really cute idea with the product, but it makes me curious as to if those who donu2019t know that these are shampoos or conditioners (or have young children at home) may find these and think theyu2019re to drink. I wished the packaging had the words u201cshampoou201d and u201cconditioneru201d in larger font to make this more obvious (Iu2019m not even a young child, nor have children, and I know this is shampoo and conditioner- yet I want to drink it lol). I also found it a bit shocking that the shampoo was that loose, and not as viscous, as I expected it to (so it even has a consistency similar to juice, which is also a concern). But, I do recommend these shampoo & conditioner!

reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Briogeo Hair Care.  Briogeo is a cruelty free, clean hair product that will work on all hair types so I was super excited to try this brand to see how it would work for my dry, way hair.  That set packaging was super cute and came with a bunch of information about the brand so I could get to know them better.  The packaging on these products is super cute and remind me of fresh made juices that one would get to drink from a grocery store.     Upon opening the shampoo, it smells  super good and fruity.  It definitely have a strong mango scent, but I don't get too much cherry from it, to be honest. I'm not complaining though because it smells mouth watering, almost good enough to eat!  The shampoo has a really runny texture so it's easy to accidentally spill it out of your hands.  I applied to the roots of my hair and it lathered up really nicely.  It rinsed away really easily and it left my hair feeling clean, but not stripped and dry, which I am very thankful for!! This is a gentle, but powerful shampoo that worked even for my dry hair. I'm impressed.  The conditioner has a thick, smooth texture to it.  It smells just as good as the shampoo, just like a mango smoothie! Yummy!  I applied the conditioner starting at my ends and working my way up, while detangling as I went.  It has a nice slip to it which made detangling very easy.  I left the conditioner the rest of my shower, rinsing right before it was time to get out, probably about 5 -7 minutes or so.  My hair felt SO soft when rinsing.  I am not exaggerating when I say, it's the smoothest and softest my hair has ever felt when rinsing a conditioner.  SO IMPRESSED!!  After drying, my hair actually looked really good.  It gave my hair a great shine (normally it's DULL) and added volume and bounce, which I was not expecting. I still had some tangles at my ends, which is just something that I've come to live with because of my hair texture, BUT I did notice an improvement a
